alert.note: Alert for Emery (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 25 at 3:57PM MDT until June 25 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR SOUTHERN EMERY COUNTY... At 357 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rainfall has occurred over the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. This warning includes Little Wildhorse, Bell, Crack and Chute Canyons. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of slot canyons and normally dry washes. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Goblin Valley, Little Wildhorse, Bell, Crack and Chute Canyons. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Seek higher ground in or near any of the canyons in the area. Do not cross or park in dry washes.
